description.p: A race born from the happenstance of corrupted aasimar and tieflings resulting in anything from an akward shambling monstrosity to a beautiful amalgamation of the two.
Abominations have names that are specific to their parent races. These names can often be difficult for members of other races to pronounce, so they can adopt nicknames when traveling

Male Names:Akmenos, Amnon, Barakas, Damakos, Ekemon, Iados, Kairon, Leucis, Melech, Mordai, Morthos,
Female Names:Akta, Anakis, Bryseis, Criella, Damaia, Ea, Kallista,
Abominations have the following racial traits.

Ability Score Increase.Your Charisma score increases by 2, and your Intelligence score increases by 1.
Age.Abomination mature at the same rate as humans.
Size.Tieflings are about the same size and build as humans. Your size is Medium
Speed.Your base walking speed is 30 feet. Your base flying speed is 30 feet for up to 30 minutes per rest, time increases to 1 hour at 9th level, and unlimited at 17th level.
Language.You can speak, read, and write Common, Celestial, and Infernal.
Abominable Legacy.You know the thaumaturgy and the light cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the hellish rebuke spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the darkness spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.
Abominable Touch.As an action, you can touch a creature and cause it to regain 1 hit point per level + spell modifier; when you do so it creates a bright harmless flame at the point of contact accompanied by a booming sound and smell of sulfur. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.
